headers.Access-Control-Allow-Headers: X-CSRF-Token, X-Requested-With, Accept, Accept-Version, Content-Length, Content-MD5, Content-Type, Date, X-Api-Version
headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' vercel.live *.vercel.app; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' vercel.live *.vercel.app; script-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-inline' vercel.live *.vercel.app; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data:;
